heading: HB00502
0: AN ACT AMENDING TITLE I, CHAPTER 3, OF EXECUTIVE ORDER     NO. 209, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, PRESCRIBING ADDITIONAL GROUND FOR ANNULMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2019-07-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00502
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING TITLE I, CHAPTER 3, OF EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 209, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, PRESCRIBING ADDITIONAL GROUND FOR ANNULMENT
ABSTRACT : Seeks to include Article 45-A in Title 1, Chapter 3 of the Family Code entitled: Void and Voidable Marriages: "Art.45-A. A marriage may also be annulled if the parties have been separated in fact for at least five years."
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BARBERS, ROBERT ACE S.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Paduano (000 2019-08-13)2. Remulla (000 2019-08-13)
3. Peña (000 2019-08-13)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON REVISION OF LAWS ON 2019-07-23
